We reached a bottleneck with the absence of Mr. Ram and the closing period of Baccarat, we cannot bring the team to install on the 18th of August, we need to get the approval to install the Chandelier on the 15th and 18th of July and we need a contact name and number with the Villa address to send the chandelier directly there. 

	 

	Below is the brand reply on our request:

	 

	As discussed earlier this week, the bespoke Tuile chandelier for Mr. Patrick Chalhoub is available and is waiting for shipping instructions.

	 

	2 possible options

	1.	Assembling by Baccarat Team on July 15-16

	(the team has to fly back on the July 17th because they are on vacation starting July 18th)

	=> In that case we would send the chandelier with DAP incoterms to Mr. Patrick Chalhoub's house in order to secure delivery on time for assembling

	2.	ssembling by Baccarat team week commencing August 18th

	(please note that it is the only time slot available otherwise it postpones the assembling to October)

	Please on urgent basis we need:

	 

	1.	Approval to fix 15 and 16th July
	2.	Address and contact name and number 

	 

	Thank you

	 

GHASSAN CHAMMAS
